Stepsize | Data Engineer | London, UK | Full-Time, On-site | https://www.stepsize.com

Stepsize’s mission is to make software development universally accessible.

We’re building a tool that helps agile engineering teams be more effective / productive. It automatically creates self-maintaining documentation by tying together data from all the tools they use every day.

This enables everyone in the team to be more efficient, ship better software faster, and avoid wasting time on bad docs.

We’re looking for someone to help us develop the magic that powers the product. You’ll be working on: - Ingesting complex data streams, massaging the data into our various stores - Conceptualising & implementing your own algorithms - Delivering the relevant processed data to the front-end

£40k-£80k | 0.3% - 0.6% equity See more details: https://storage.googleapis.com/stepsize-job-descriptions/dat...
